name: Dunes of Unknown
description:
Dunes of Unknown

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021

Dunes of Unknown is a two player co-op platformer game. You need to find your path in a mysterious planet. To overcome the difficulties you need to work together, and to defeat the creatures you need to fuse. Can you survive through this adventure and reveal the truth? Or will you die in the dunes of unknown?

Unity Developer: Ahmet Fırat Gamsız

Pixel Artists: Ebru Naz Ayış   

               Ecem Ataman

Controller Icons: Controller Icon Pack

Sound Effects: ZapSplat
